page.title: 11LIVING ON A FARM TODAY
page.content: I live at Murrells End Farm which has 430 acres. We grow 90 acres of barley, 180 acres of wheat, 20 acres of potatoes, 40 acres of oil seed rape. We graze 100 beef cattle to the weight of 650 kgs. on 100 acres of grass . We have 1 Claas Combine Harvester, 3 Massey Ferguson tractors, and a 1000 tonne grain store. We breed horses to be sold as National Hunt Race Horses. I own 2 ponies which I enjoy riding. During the winter months I help feed the cattle as they are wintered in the barn and help fork out the silage. In the summer I help harvest the fields baling the straw, but I especially like riding on the combine. In the Autumn I ride on the potato harvester, helping to grade the potatoes which are sold to shops in the neighbourhood.
